intension: Design a poster for a natural skincare sale, featuring a discount of 30%. Include the website address www.beautyattack.com.
globalcaption: The image features a woman with a leaf on her head, possibly a green leaf, as part of a beauty attack advertisement. She is wearing a white shirt and appears to be the main focus of the advertisement. The leaf is positioned above her head, covering a significant portion of her face.
keywords: beauty, skincare, natural, cosmetic, care, nature, skin, cream, organic, treatment, wellness, fresh, health, oil, moisturizer, facial, cosmetology, serum, bottle, healthy, cosmetics, sale, discount, leaf, woman, girl, poster

bglayer.bgcaption: The image is a white background with a slightly blurred appearance. The white color covers the entire frame, creating a clean and minimalist look

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a woman with a leaf on her head, possibly a green leaf or a palm frond. She is wearing a white shirt and appears to be posing for the camera. The leaf is positioned above her head, covering a significant portion of her face. The woman's hair is pulled back, and she is looking upwards, creating a unique and artistic composition
